episodes.title: I grew up in a cult  It was heaven    and hell    Lilia Tarawa  Christchurch
episodes.description:
Lilia Tarawa's quote encapsulates the complexity of growing up in a cult, where experiences can be both heavenly and hellish. It's a poignant reminder of how such environments can create a mixture of profound belonging and profound suffering for those involved.
Lilia Tarawa is a New Zealand author, speaker, and advocate who gained attention for her memoir "Daughter of Gloriavale: My Life in a Religious Cult." She was born into the Gloriavale Christian Community, a closed religious sect in New Zealand. Her book recounts her experiences growing up in the cult and her journey to break free from its constraints. The quote you provided, "I grew up in a cult. It was heaven -- and hell," succinctly encapsulates the complex and conflicting emotions she experienced within the cult environment.
